name: Imagine Earth
description: In this build-up strategy game you build global colonies on distant planets. Establish space trade and research to lead your corporation into wealth and prosperity. Find allies, compete against rivals, and protect your civilization from natural disasters and alien invaders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz or multiple cores with 1,5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compliant graphics card with 1GB dedicated memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Windows Vista and XP might work, but are not officially supported
